review.title: “Very open to let you be free in the way you perform your job.”
review.pros: Pros – Managements consideration of what is important to you and working around your issues when they arise.
review.cons: Cons – Management is very narrow minded and difficult to except new ideas even when they were industry standard 10 years ago.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More open minded, willingness to adapt to a changing market

review.cons: Cons – Not Enough BusinessNo Human Resources - excellent employees get run off
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Leadership Training for Management/Owner

review.title: “Great job with better pay than most.”
review.pros: Pros – Great pay scale. Better than all other places ive worked. Great place to learn how to fix cars and get great experience in a broad variety of cars.
review.cons: Cons – Not alot of negative. Job based on hourly productivity so can be rough in the slower months. Base pay on the scale is low so you must stay busy to make money
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Higher base pay for employees.
